text: "Say Goodbye" is a 1999 song recorded by Swedish Eurodance band La Cream. It was released as the third single from their only album, Sound & Vision and was a big hit in Scandinavia. The single peaked at number 5 in Finland, number 9 in Norway, number 17 in Denmark and number 21 in Sweden. The song is sung by lead vocalist Tess Mattisson, who also co-wrote it. ==Track listing== ==Chart performance== ===Weekly charts=== {|class="wikitable sortable" ! Chart (1999) !
